titlestmt.author: Collection guide written by Jean Luddy. Collection processed by Jean Luddy and Cheri Arzt.
titlestmt.sponsor: This project was made possible in part through a grant from the Institute of Museum and Library Services to the Connecticut State Library on behalf of the State Archives and Conservation ConneCTion.

titlepage.publisher:
Vernon Historical Society
734 Hartford Turnpike
Vernon, CT 06066
titlepage.p: This project was made possible in part through a grant from the Institute of Museum and Library Services to the Connecticut State Library on behalf of the State Archives and Conservation ConneCTion.
© 2018 Vernon Historical Society. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: The collection contains photo negatives, photographs and news clippings from articles published in The Manchester Evening Herald. The images relate to articles featuring local people, businesses, or social, cultural or political events that occurred between 1952 and 1979.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Vernon Historical Society.
The suggested citation for the collection is:
Manchester Evening Herald Photograph Collection, 1952-1979 Vernon Historical Society Vernon, Connecticut

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], , [Box no]., Vernon Historical Society

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: In 1991 the Manchester Historical Society gave the Vernon Historical Society a collection of photo negatives, photograph and news clipping from defunct Manchester Evening Herald newspaper of Manchester, Connecticut

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: When The Manchester Evening Herald newspaper from Manchester Connecticut ceased publication in 1981, they turned over their archives to the Manchester Historical Society. In 1991 the Society removed negatives, clippings and photographs from the archive that related to towns outside of Manchester and offered the materials to local historical societies or libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of images taken to accompany articles in the paper. The bulk of the collection consists of photo negatives. Some photographs were submitted by people or businesses or political campaigns for an article. This collection of images aligns with articles of local interest. Topics include elections, political campaigns, business stories, school events, social events, community activities. The collection provides insight into local happenings for the 1950s through the 1970s.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The images are arranged chronologocialy. Each set of images is in an acid free photo envelope with the original paper sleeve included. For each set of images, we asked a photograph to print one negative as a photo to help with preparing a subject catalog. The collection fills 6 boxes. A subject catalog with location information for each image has been entered into an Excel spread sheet.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Vernon, Connecticut
Rockville, Connecticut
Photographs
Black and White Negatives
Newspaper Clippings

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: A separate box has related news clippings from the original articles.
